title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 10.2 - Proxies, consents and authorizations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 10.2 - Proxies, consents and authorizations

State Regulations

No domestic stock insurer, or any director, officer or employee of such insurer subject to section
10.1
of this Part, or any other person, shall solicit, or permit the use of his name to solicit, by mail or otherwise, any proxy, consent or authorization in respect of any stock of such insurer in contravention of this Part and Schedules A and B hereto annexed and hereby made a part of this Part [see Appendix 7, infra]. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
10.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
